Review_title: Fresh insights on a horror classic
Review_Text: Saw the film at the Denver Film Festival and was thoroughly impressed. "Chain Reactions" blends horror lore with sharp analysis on the cultural impact of Tobe Hooper's "Texas Chainsaw Massacre".It honors the terror classic while dissecting the haunting legacy it left behind. With insightful interviews and new archival footage, this documentary sheds light on the film's lasting shockwaves, from fan obsessions to the genre's darker inspirations. For horror buffs and film historians alike, it's a fascinating examination of how one story-with a chainsaw's relentless bite-continues to haunt our collective psyche.Fans of the original will find this a compelling film that cuts deep.
